p1_sign_up_verification.en-US: Your P1 confirmation code is: {{sign_up_verification_code}} (This code will expire after {{verification_code_ttl}} minutes)
p1_sign_up_verification.zh-CN: 您的P1注册验证码为：{{sign_up_verification_code}}（此验证码{{verification_code_ttl}}分钟内有效）

p1_reset_password.zh-CN: 点击链接重置P1账号密码: {{reset_password_link}}

street_style_notification.en-US: Hi, your streetstyle picture is waiting for you. Download the P1 app https://p1.com/d/sms and register with the phone number or weibo you provided us to see it.
street_style_notification.zh-CN: Hi，下载P1 APP，您的街拍照片在等着您来欣赏并分享！提示：请使用您留给摄影师的手机号码或者微博注册。 https://p1.com/d/sms

street_style_second_notification.en-US: Hi, your streetstyle picture is still waiting for you. Download the P1 app https://p1.com/d/sms and register with the phone number or weibo you provided us to see it.
street_style_second_notification.zh-CN: Hi，您的街拍照片还没有取回。请下载P1 APP，使用留给摄影师的微博、邮箱注册，照片会自动推送给您。 https://p1.com/d/sms

tantan_promotion.en_US: Hi {{first_name}}, also try out our new app Tantan, a fun and easy way to meet people around you! http://r.tantanapp.cn/sstyle
tantan_promotion.zh-CN: Hi {{first_name}}，诚邀您试一下我们新推出的APP “探探”，全新社交体验，“左右”你的缘分！ http://r.tantanapp.cn/sstyle

tantan_sign_up_verification.en-US: Your confirmation code is: {{verification_code}} (valid for {{verification_code_ttl}} minutes)
tantan_sign_up_verification.zh-CN: 您的验证码为： {{verification_code}} （此验证码{{verification_code_ttl}}分钟内有效）

tantan_sign_in_verification.en-US: Your confirmation code is: {{verification_code}} (valid for {{verification_code_ttl}} minutes)

tantan_secret_crush_with_name.en-US: Hi {{name}}, someone has a crush on you from Tantan! Download Tantan to find who it is: https://d.tantanapp.com 回T退订
tantan_secret_crush_with_name.zh-CN: {{name}}，你有一个通讯录好友在［探探］上将你设置为“暗恋对象”。由于你尚未下载探探，特以短信通知。如果你们互相“暗恋”，系统会为你们自动配对。点击https://d.tantanapp.com ，作出你的选择。回T退订
